계좌비밀번호를 저장하신 후 저장해제를 하지 않는 한 프로그램 종료시까지: Once you save your account password, it will remain saved until the program is closed unless you disable the saving option. Please use the screen lock feature or exit the program.
프로그램 이용중 계좌비밀번호를 변경하셨을 경우에는 기존 저장되어 있던 계: If you change your account password while using the program, the previously saved account password will be disabled. Please save the new account password again.
계좌비밀번호 저장기능은 고객님의 부주의로 의도치 않은 주문이 실행될 수: The account password saving feature may lead to unintended orders being executed due to customer negligence, and third parties may access your information and make orders. Please be cautious while using this feature. The responsibility for any unintended orders or damages during the use of this feature lies with the customer, and the company is not at fault.
The designated deposit account may change periodically.
Please confirm the deposit designated account through 'Designated Account Inquiry' before making a deposit.
If you have made a deposit and applied for deposit, approval will be done within 5 minutes.
입금신청 후 20분 이내에 입금이 되지 않는 경우에는 신청 내용이 자동: If the deposit is not made within 20 minutes after the deposit application, the application will be automatically deleted. To speed up the process, it is recommended to deposit first and then apply for deposit.
For any issues, please contact customer service via 1:1 inquiry.
입금 시 등록된 출금계좌와 동일한 명의의 계좌에서 입금하셔야만 입금이 가: Deposit is only possible from an account with the same name as the registered withdrawal account.
Open banking services such as Toss Bank, securities accounts, and KakaoPay are not supported.
Deposits from other banks, different account names, or check deposits will not be processed.
09시부터 17시까지(주말 휴무) 업무시간 내 자유롭게 전환 및 출금이: You can freely convert and withdraw during business hours from 9 AM to 5 PM (weekends off).
최근 달러의 심각한 등락과 더불어 불법 환율 차익 거래를 방지하고자 1회: Due to the recent severe fluctuations in the dollar and to prevent illegal currency arbitrage, the amount for each conversion and withdrawal is limited.
For more details, please refer to the announcements.
